org.ligoj.app.resource.delegate

Class DelegateOrgResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.delegate.DelegateOrgResource

  • @Path(value="/security/delegate")
 @Service
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class DelegateOrgResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Organizational delegation resource.

      • create

        @POST
public int create(DelegateOrgEditionVo vo)
        Create a delegate. Rules are :
        • Related company, group or tree must be managed by the current user, directly or via a another parent delegate.
        • 'write' flag cannot be true without already owning an applicable delegate with this flag.
        • 'admin' flag cannot be true without already owning an applicable delegate with this flag.
        Parameters:
        vo - the object to create.
        Returns:
        the entity's identifier.

      • update

        @PUT
public void update(DelegateOrgEditionVo vo)
        Update entity.
        Parameters:
        vo - the object to update.

      • delete

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="{id:\\d+}")
public void delete(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                     int id)
        Delete entity. Rules, order is important :
        • Related delegate must exist
        • Related delegate must be managed by the current user with 'admin' right, directly or via a another parent delegate tree/company/.., or act as if the delegate does not exist.
        Attention, DN is case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity identifier.
